post.description:
Upload a single file and optionally create a task (backward compatibility)

Args:
    file: Uploaded file
    task_type: Type of task (e.g., "general")
    message: Optional message to include with the task

Returns:
    Upload result with file info and optional task ID

schema.title: Response Upload File Api Files Upload Post

post.description:
Upload multiple files and optionally create a task (new format)

Args:
    files: List of uploaded files
    task_type: Type of task (e.g., "general")
    message: Optional message to include with the task
    task_id: Optional task ID to organize files in task-specific folder
    folder: Optional folder name within task directory (e.g., "input", "output")

Returns:
    Upload result with file info and optional task ID

schema.title: Response Upload Multiple Files Api Files Upload Multiple Post

get.description: List user's uploaded files

schema.title: Response List Files Api Files List Get

get.description: Download uploaded file

Preview a file with automatic PPTX to HTML conversion.

This endpoint checks if the file is a PPTX and automatically converts
it to HTML for browser preview. For other file types, returns the file as-is.

Public endpoint for previewing task output files.
This endpoint does not require authentication but validates task ownership.

schema.title: Response Delete File Api Files  Filename  Delete

post.description:
Upload and ingest a document into the knowledge base.

Args:
    collection: Target collection name. If not provided, uses file name.
    file: The document file to upload and process.
    parse_method: Parser used during ingestion.
    chunk_strategy: Strategy for chunking the document.
    chunk_size: Target chunk size in characters.
    chunk_overlap: Overlap between consecutive chunks.
    embedding_model_id: Embedding model ID from model hub.
    embedding_batch_size: Batch size for embedding operations.
    max_retries: Maximum retry attempts for failures.
    retry_delay: Delay between retry attempts in seconds.

get.description: List all collections with their statistics.

post.description:
Search documents in the knowledge base.

Args:
    collection: Target collection to search within.
    query_text: Query text to search for.
    embedding_model_id: Embedding model ID (required for dense/hybrid search).
    search_type: Search strategy (dense, sparse, or hybrid).
    top_k: Maximum number of results to return.
    filters: Optional filters for search.
    fusion_config: Optional fusion configuration for hybrid search.
    rerank_model_id: Optional rerank model for result reordering.
    rerank_top_k: Override for rerank result count.
    readonly: Whether to avoid index modifications.
    nprobes: Number of partitions to probe for ANN search.
    refine_factor: Refine factor for ANN search re-ranking.
    fallback_to_sparse: Allow hybrid search to fallback to sparse.

Crawl a website and ingest all pages into the knowledge base.

Args:
    collection: Target collection name
    start_url: Starting URL for crawling
    max_pages: Maximum number of pages to crawl
    max_depth: Maximum crawl depth
    url_patterns: Comma-separated URL match patterns (regex)
    exclude_patterns: Comma-separated exclusion patterns (regex)
    same_domain_only: Only crawl same domain
    content_selector: CSS selector for main content area
    remove_selectors: Comma-separated CSS selectors to remove
    concurrent_requests: Number of concurrent requests
    request_delay: Delay between requests in seconds
    timeout: Request timeout in seconds
    respect_robots_txt: Respect robots.txt rules
    parse_method: Parser for document ingestion
    chunk_strategy: Chunking strategy
    chunk_size: Chunk size in characters
    chunk_overlap: Chunk overlap in characters
    embedding_model_id: Embedding model ID
    embedding_batch_size: Batch size for embedding
    max_retries: Maximum retry attempts
    retry_delay: Delay between retries

delete.description:
Delete a collection and all its data.

Args:
    collection_name: Name of the collection to delete

Returns:
    Deletion result with status and affected documents

put.description:
Rename a collection.

Args:
    collection_name: Current collection name
    new_name: New collection name

Returns:
    Success message

schema.title: Response Rename Collection Api Api Kb Collections  Collection Name  Put

delete.description:
Delete a document and all its associated data.

Args:
    collection_name: Name of the collection
    filename: Document filename (will be used to find doc_id)

Returns:
    Deletion result with status, list of deleted doc_ids, and filename

Note:
    This endpoint uses filename lookup which may have a race condition if
    the same filename is uploaded multiple times concurrently. For production
    use, consider using doc_id directly or adding a filename index column.

schema.title: Response Delete Document Api Api Kb Collections  Collection Name  Documents  Filename  Delete

AgentUpdateRequest.title: AgentUpdateRequest
AgentUpdateRequest.description: Request model for updating an agent.

parse_method.description: Parser used during ingestion. Options: default, pypdf, pdfplumber, unstructured, pymupdf, deepdoc

chunk_strategy.description: Chunking strategy. Options: recursive (default), fixed_size, markdown

max_pages.title: Max Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl (default: 100)

content_selector.title: Content Selector
content_selector.description: CSS selector for main content area

search_type.description: Search strategy: dense, sparse, or hybrid (default: hybrid)

top_k.title: Top K
top_k.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Optional filters to apply during search (LanceDB format)

fusion_config.title: Fusion Config
fusion_config.description: Optional fusion configuration for hybrid search

rerank_model_id.title: Rerank Model Id
rerank_model_id.description: Optional rerank model ID for result reordering

rerank_top_k.title: Rerank Top K
rerank_top_k.description: Optional override for rerank result count

nprobes.title: Nprobes
nprobes.description: Number of partitions to probe for ANN search

refine_factor.title: Refine Factor
refine_factor.description: Refine factor for ANN search re-ranking

fallback_to_sparse.title: Fallback To Sparse
fallback_to_sparse.description: Allow hybrid search to fallback to sparse (default: True)

embedding_model_id.title: Embedding Model Id
embedding_model_id.description: Fixed embedding model ID. Set during first document ingestion.

embedding_dimension.title: Embedding Dimension
embedding_dimension.description: Vector dimension. Auto-detected from embedding model.

document_names.title: Document Names
document_names.description: Distinct source paths for documents within the collection

collection_locked.title: Collection Locked
collection_locked.description: Whether to lock collection configuration. When True, enforces strict config validation.

allow_mixed_parse_methods.title: Allow Mixed Parse Methods
allow_mixed_parse_methods.description: Whether to allow mixed parse methods within the collection. When False, enforces type-based parse method consistency.

skip_config_validation.title: Skip Config Validation
skip_config_validation.description: Skip collection configuration validation. Use with caution.

CollectionInfo.title: CollectionInfo
CollectionInfo.description: Aggregate metadata for a single collection with embedding binding.

doc_id.title: Doc Id
doc_id.description: Document identifier affected by the operation

status.description: Resulting status recorded for the document

message.title: Message
message.description: Optional message describing individual document handling

CollectionOperationDetail.title: CollectionOperationDetail
CollectionOperationDetail.description: Per-document detail for collection-level management operations.

collection.title: Collection
collection.description: Collection identifier affected by the operation

message.title: Message
message.description: Human-readable summary of the collection operation

warnings.title: Warnings
warnings.description: Non-fatal issues encountered while processing the collection

affected_documents.title: Affected Documents
affected_documents.description: Subset of documents impacted by the collection operation

deleted_counts.title: Deleted Counts
deleted_counts.description: Aggregated deletion counts per table when applicable

CollectionOperationResult.title: CollectionOperationResult
CollectionOperationResult.description: Response payload for collection-level management operations.

DatabaseCreateRequest.title: DatabaseCreateRequest
DatabaseCreateRequest.description: Request schema for creating a new database configuration

parse_hash.title: Parse Hash
parse_hash.description: Parse hash produced during parse_document step

chunk_count.title: Chunk Count
chunk_count.description: Number of chunks created; must be non-negative

embedding_count.title: Embedding Count
embedding_count.description: Number of embeddings generated; must be non-negative

vector_count.title: Vector Count
vector_count.description: Number of vectors written to storage; must be non-negative

failed_step.title: Failed Step
failed_step.description: Pipeline step where failure occurred, if any

IngestionResult.title: IngestionResult
IngestionResult.description: Structured response for the document ingestion pipeline.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Additional metadata captured for the step

IngestionStepResult.title: IngestionStepResult
IngestionStepResult.description: Metadata for a successfully completed pipeline step.

ListCollectionsResult.title: ListCollectionsResult
ListCollectionsResult.description: Response payload for the list collections operation.

MCPConnectionTest.description: Request model for testing MCP connection.

MCPConnectionTestResponse.description: Response model for MCP connection test.

MCPServerCreate.description: Request model for creating MCP server.

MCPServerUpdate.description: Request model for updating MCP server.

ModelWithAccessInfo.title: ModelWithAccessInfo
ModelWithAccessInfo.description: Model response with user access information

llm_id.title: Llm Id
llm_id.description: LLM ID to use for selection

search_type.description: Actual search strategy executed (post-fallback if any)

used_rerank.title: Used Rerank
used_rerank.description: Whether rerank model was applied to the results

SearchPipelineResult.title: SearchPipelineResult
SearchPipelineResult.description: Unified response payload for document search pipeline.

score.title: Score
score.description: Similarity score (0-1, higher is better); must be between 0 and 1 inclusive

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Additional metadata for the chunk (page_number, section, source, etc.)

vector_rank.title: Vector Rank
vector_rank.description: Original rank in vector search results (1-based)

fts_rank.title: Fts Rank
fts_rank.description: Original rank in FTS search results (1-based)

SearchType.title: SearchType
SearchType.description: Unified search types for the document search pipeline.

TemplateDetail.title: TemplateDetail
TemplateDetail.description: Template complete information with agent config

UserDefaultModelCreate.title: UserDefaultModelCreate
UserDefaultModelCreate.description: User default model configuration creation schema

UserDefaultModelResponse.title: UserDefaultModelResponse
UserDefaultModelResponse.description: User default model configuration response schema

total_urls_found.title: Total Urls Found
total_urls_found.description: Total number of unique URLs discovered

pages_failed.title: Pages Failed
pages_failed.description: Number of pages that failed to crawl

documents_created.title: Documents Created
documents_created.description: Number of documents created in collection

failed_urls.title: Failed Urls
failed_urls.description: Map of failed URLs to error messages

WebIngestionResult.title: WebIngestionResult
WebIngestionResult.description:
Result of website crawling and knowledge base ingestion.

This model provides comprehensive statistics about the crawling and
ingestion process, including success/failure counts and timing.
